meanings.definition: A gift or token given for good luck or as a sign of goodwill.
meanings.sent1: She received a handsels from her friend before the big exam.
meanings.sent2: The handsels he gave her brought a smile to her face.
meanings.sent3: The handsels was a lucky charm that she carried everywhere.
meanings.sent4: The handsels acted as a beacon of positivity in her life.
meanings.sent5: The handsels was a small gesture that meant a lot to her.

meanings.definition: To give a handsel to someone as a token of good luck or goodwill.
meanings.sent1: He handsels his teammates before every game for good luck.
meanings.sent2: She handsels her friends with small tokens of appreciation.
meanings.sent3: The magician handsels the audience with a surprise trick.
meanings.sent4: The chef handsels the customers with complimentary desserts.
meanings.sent5: The teacher handsels her students with encouraging words.
